ðŸ“– Summary: Txplain is an open-source AI-powered service that transforms complex blockchain transaction data into human-readable summaries. It uses direct blockchain calls and contract introspection, leveraging AI to provide accurate and comprehensive transaction analysis across multiple networks like Ethereum, Polygon, and Arbitrum.
